edu.monash.fit2099.engine

Class ActorLocations

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.ActorLocations
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Actor>

    public class ActorLocations
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Actor>
    Represents a bimap of locations and actors. Hence it enforces the one actor per location rule. Has a nifty iterator that lets us modify the collection while iterating it.
